ability.name: Energy Connect
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you make take one basic Energy cards attached to one of your Benched Pokémon and attach it to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Ampharos is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Lightning Strike
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy cards attached to Ampharos. If you do, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 40.

attacks.name: Poison Spray
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Poison Reaction
attacks.text: (20+) If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

ability.name: Jet Stream
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Blastoise is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to Blastoise, if any. Then, if there are any Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon, choose one of them and discard it. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Cannon
attacks.text: (40+) Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

ability.name: Moonlight
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may put a card from your hand back on your deck. If you do so, search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Clefable is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: (20x) Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

ability.name: Major Tsunami
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Feraligatr is your Active Pokémon and if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. Either way, if you have any Benched Pokémon, switch Feraligatr with 1 of them. This power can't be used if Feraligatr is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rending Jaws
attacks.text: If there are no damage counters on the Defending Pokémon, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 70.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Giant Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Terraforming
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck and rearrange them as you like. This power can't be used if Machamp is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Iron Fist
attacks.text: (50+) Count the number of Pokémon you have in play with damage counters on them. Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each of those Pokémon.

cards.name: Magby
text: If this Baby Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and your opponent tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else required in order to use that attack). If tails, your opponent's turn ends without an attack.

attacks.name: Energy Catch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put a basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Mislead
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Ethereal Flame
attacks.text: (30+) Discard all R Energy cards attached to Ninetales. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each cards discarded this way.

ability.name: Beating Wings
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), If Pidgeot is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it in your deck. This power can't be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sharp Beak
attacks.text: (20+) Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Steel Beak
attacks.text: (20+) Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Air Cutter
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Heat Up
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), You may count the total number of Energy cards attached to all of your Pokémon and all of your opponent's Pokémon. If your opponent has more total energy cards attached, you may search your deck for 1 Fire Energy card and attach it to one of your Benched Pokémon, if any. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.name: Dark Aura
ability.text: All Energy attached to Tyranitar is Dark instead of its usual type.

attacks.name: Stamp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage and does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon, if any. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Cannon
attacks.text: (40x) Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

ability.name: Jet Stream
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Blastoise is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to Blastoise, if any. Then, if there are any Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon, choose one of them and discard it. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Cannon
attacks.text: (40+) Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

ability.name: Burning Energy
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may turn all basic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Scorching Whirlwind
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If 1 of them is tails, discards 3 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If both of them are tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Charizard.

ability.name: Moonlight
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may put a card from your hand back on your deck. If you do so, search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Clefable is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: (20x) Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Auto Fire
attacks.text: (20x) Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Feraligatr is your Active Pokémon and if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. Either way, if you have any Benched Pokémon, switch Feraligatr with 1 of them. This power can't be used if Feraligatr is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rending Jaws
attacks.text: If there are no damage counters on the Defending Pokémon, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 70.

ability.name: Chaos Move
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if your opponent has 3 or fewer Prizes, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon (yours or your opponent's) to another (even if it would Knock Out the other Pokémon). This power can't be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hide in Shadows
attacks.text: Switch Gengar with one of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Giant Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Ethereal Flame
attacks.text: (30+) Discard all Energy cards attached to Ninetales. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each cards discarded this way.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Heat Up
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), You may count the total number of Energy cards attached to all of your Pokémon and all of your opponent's Pokémon. If your opponent has more total energy cards attached, you may search your deck for 1 Fire Energy card and attach it to one of your Benched Pokémon, if any. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Mysterious Powder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Bind Wound
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon (1 if it has only 1).

attacks.name: Dogpile
attacks.text: (10x) Count the number for Pokémon on your Bench. This attack does 10 times that number to the Defending Pokémon, and Chansey does 10 times that number of damage to itself.

attacks.name: Entangling Thread
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Energy Draw
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Electabuzz. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: If you have any Benched Pokémon and if there are any basic Energy cards attached to Electabuzz, take 1 of those Energy cards and attach it to 1 of those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Hurl
attacks.text: Don't apply Resistance.

attacks.name: Rock Slide
attacks.text: Chose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon (1 if he or she has only 1). This attack does 10 damage to each of those Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stretch Kick
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, chose 1 of them and this attack does 30 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sleep Seed
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Exoskeleton
ability.text: All damage done to Metapod is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Sleep Seed
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.text: (20x) Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Bad Dream
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Double Chop
attacks.text: (20x) Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Fury Strikes
attacks.text: (10x) Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Stun Needle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Horn Hazard
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: Tauros does 20 Damage to itself.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Metal Energy (Special)
text: Damage done by attacks to the Pokémon Metal Energy is attached to is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If the Pokémon Metal Energy is attached to isn't M, whenever it damages a Pokémon by an attack, reduce that damage by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). Metal Energy provides M Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

ability.name: Harvest Bounty
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), If you attach an Energy card from your hand to your Active Pokémon as part of your turn, you may attach an additional Energy card to that Pokémon at the same time. This power can't be used if Venusaur is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Foul Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Misfire
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, put 6 damage counters on Weezing.

ability.name: Psymimic
ability.text: Once during your turn, instead of Alakazam's normal attack, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attack. Alakazam copies that attack including its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type that Pokémon is, Alakazam's type is still Psychic.) This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Syncroblast
attacks.text: If Alakazam and the Defending Pokémon don't have the same number of Energy cards on them, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 80.

attacks.name: Poison Spray
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Clutch

ability.name: Plunge
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Poliwrath is on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, take all Energy cards attached to your Active Pokémon, if any, and attach them to Poliwrath. Then switch Poliwrath with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Water Punch
attacks.text: (40+) Flip a number of coins equal to the amount of W Energy cards attached to Poliwrath. This attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.
